release dates: India::3 January 2018                            (WEB SERIES ON YOU TUBE)
imdb.plot outline: A book recently published by an ex - CIA agent raises many questions about the dubious nature of Indian involvement in a secret mission conducted in 1965, specially of an IB agent known as PHOENIX. A girl recognizes the picture of PHOENIX to be that of her grand father who went missing thirty years back without a trace. She along with her brother sets out to seek the truth. Little do the seekers realize that they have set upon a dangerous mission and there are people who would do anything to let the truth remain buried forever.
imdb.title: Seeking Truth - The Phoenix Trail
plot: A book recently published by an ex - CIA agent raises many questions about the dubious nature of Indian involvement in a secret mission conducted in 1965, specially of an IB agent known as PHOENIX. A girl recognizes the picture of PHOENIX to be that of her grand father who went missing thirty years back without a trace. She along with her brother sets out to seek the truth. Little do the seekers realize that they have set upon a dangerous mission and there are people who would do anything to let the truth remain buried forever.::VDB
